article_title: Will we need banks in the future?
article_text:
Thank you for reading HeraldMailMedia.com free articles on our site. og.description: There was a time, not that long ago, that gambling types could write a check on an empty bank account, buy stocks, turn a quick profit and deposit the funds back into the bank before the check cleared.Technology ended the practice maybe 15 years ago,|
